fullplot: Pete Garvey, foreign correspondent, has been running an impromptu adoption agency for war orphans in Paris, when an ultimatum from his erstwhile fiancèe Emmadel Jones draws him back to Boston, complete with two adopted orphans to melt her heart. Too late! She's now engaged to rich, handsome Wilbur Stanley. And if Pete's not married within five days, he loses the kids. He'll have to work fast...
plot: Foreign correspondent Pete Garvey has 5 days to win back his former fiancèe, or he'll lose the orphans he adopted.
title: Here Comes the Groom
